content: next 4 sts* repeat * * around 72 rounds 7 - 14 work a double_crochet into each st around 72 pattern continued round 15 slip_stitch into the first st of the round if you have not already *single_crochet in next st 2hdc in next st 2dc in next st treble_crochet in next st 2dc in next st 2hdc in next st single_crochet in next st slip_stitch in next st * repeat * * around for a total of 9 petals round 16 *single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next st 2hdc in next st 2dc in next 2 sts treble_crochet in next st 2dc in next 2 sts 2hdc in next st half_double_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st slip_stitch into the slip_stitch from previous round* repeat * * around for all 9 petals fo and weave in ends
